name: dkfds-plugins-docs
description: Documentation of plugins formerly supported by FDS

scripts.copy:assets: ncp node_modules/dkfds/src/fonts/ assets/fonts/ && ncp node_modules/dkfds/src/img/ assets/img/ && ncp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js assets/js/jquery.min.js && ncp node_modules/datatables.net/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js assets/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js && ncp node_modules/datatables.net-responsive/js/dataTables.responsive.min.js assets/js/dataTables.responsive.min.js && ncp node_modules/datatables.net-select/js/dataTables.select.min.js assets/js/dataTables.select.min.js && ncp node_modules/dkfds/dist/js/dkfds.min.js assets/js/dkfds.min.js && ncp node_modules/micromodal/dist/micromodal.min.js assets/js/micromodal.min.js && ncp node_modules/@babel/polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js assets/js/polyfill.min.js && ncp node_modules/pikaday/pikaday.js assets/js/pikaday.js && ncp node_modules/select-woo/dist/js/selectWoo.js assets/js/selectWoo.js && ncp node_modules/select-woo/dist/css/selectWoo.css assets/style/selectWoo.css && ncp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy.umd.min.js assets/js/tippy.umd.min.js  && ncp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy.umd.min.js.map assets/js/tippy.umd.min.js.map && ncp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy.css assets/style/tippy.css && ncp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.js assets/js/popper.js && ncp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.js.map assets/js/popper.js.map && ncp node_modules/dkfds/dist/scss _sass/dkfds && ncp node_modules/dkfds-plugins/dist/scss/dkfds-tippy-theme.scss _sass//dkfds-tippy-theme.scss && ncp node_modules/dkfds-plugins/dist/scss/dkfds-datatables-theme.scss _sass//dkfds-datatables-theme.scss && ncp node_modules/dkfds-plugins/dist/scss/dkfds-pikaday-theme.scss _sass//dkfds-pikaday-theme.scss && ncp node_modules/dkfds-plugins/dist/scss/dkfds-selectwoo-theme.scss _sass//dkfds-selectwoo-theme.scss
scripts.deploy: bundle exec jekyll build && ncp _site docs
